Name: BinaryBotsVR
About the game: Binary VR is a virtual reality experience of HEX WORLD, Binary is an alien from the planet HEX WORLD and had developed one robot DIMM. Which is actually full of bug and very slow. There are following stages 1) Stage 1 a) In this stage you will get introduce with Binary and DIMM. b) With binary and DIMM you need to find binary secret lab by roaming over the hex world c) Binary secret lab gate will be open automatically when you will reach near to the lab, so you need to be continue move over the hex world d) After finding the secret lab gate you will be enter into stage 2 through a underground tunnel 2) Stage 2 a) In this stage you will see yourself into the Binary secret lab. b) Where you will be able to see Binary's Lab secret components.
